summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1310, for the improvement of 4th Avenue and 4th Avenue South, from Union Street to Washington Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues under Ordinance No. 14784 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said supplemental assessment roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
